snippet: Taliban suicide bombers assaulted a joint American-Afghan air base early on Sunday, detonating explosives and engaging in a gun battle that killed at least one member of the Afghan security forces.
abstract: Taliban suicide bombers assault joint American-Afghan air base in eastern part of country, detonating explosives and engaging in gun battle that kills at least one member of Afghan security forces.
lead_paragraph: Taliban suicide bombers assaulted a joint American-Afghan air base early on Sunday, detonating explosives and engaging in a gun battle that killed at least one member of the Afghan security forces.

headline.seo: Air Base Is Attacked in Afghanistan
headline.main: At Least 1 Killed in Taliban Attack on U.S.-Afghan Base
headline.print_headline: At Least 1 Killed in Taliban Attack on U.S.-Afghan Base
